Notes: A rock that emits from the ground and breaks into a yellow orb. It can be smashed into KoopaSeals.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Camera.Description: Used when the player stands on the rock.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Objects of this class can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
